titles.title: To authorize extension of the time limitation for a FERC-issued hydroelectric license.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

bill.summary: 8/5/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon request of a certain licensee, to extend until May 31, 2000, the time required to commence construction of a specified hydroelectric project.
